title: In recognition of Leo's Oscar!!!
body:
So I haha idea since Leo's Oscar has been the focus of many many internet rants, until it became an internet phenomenon, that it seems a waste to let this go without an event to mark this milestone!

I propose a Leona "leo gets an Oscar skin"

Complete with a tux and an Oscar shaped sword of justice!

But why stop there let's get a Chris rock hosting the Oscars prime time driven chroma!!!

Let's keep it rolling, a full bundle dedicated to the night Leo got has Oscar!!!

The internet spoke and Leo got a much over due Oscar, let it now speak again as we demand recognition, Riot show people how much we love Leo and give us a skin, or even a whole bundle!!!

Would love to hear suggestions about Oscar themed skins, and and other ideation might have guys!

> Leo's got an oscar!?

LEO GOT AN OSCAR! :D

OMG FINALLY hahahahaha
LEO GOT AN OSCAR!!!!!!
Haha would be funny but I doubt riot would go for it
Ed, have you been drinking, sobre up and then realize you're drunk posting.
